title: The use of peanut shells as a bio-template to prepare K-doped In2O3 porous sheets for chlorine detection
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,32661-32667
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05208K, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Lin Zhu, Heyong Han
K-In2O3 porous sheets were prepared through a three-step process using peanut shells as a biotemplate, and exhibited an excellent gas response to low concentrations of Cl2.
